com.music.player.lib.view

类 CircleProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • com.music.player.lib.view.CircleProgressBar

  • public class CircleProgressBar
extends View
    hty_Yuye@Outlook.com 2019/5/25 一个支持圆形,饼形进度条的自定义View 如果是饼状:根据自身需求设置circlePrgBorder为0dp
